entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is being held captive by Wormtail.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: A person who is torturing Harry and attempting to resurrect his enemy using a potion.

entities.name: dagger
entities.description: A silver dagger that is being used by Wormtail to take blood from Harry.

entities.name: potion
entities.description: A potion that is being created by Wormtail using the blood of Harry's enemy.

relationships.description: Wormtail is torturing Harry, attempting to take his blood.
Wormtail is holding the silver dagger and using it to take blood from Harry.
